name: bdopf

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cbo), wf(c0, chba, chba), wcel(c0, clo))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbo), wf(c0, chba, chba))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(c0, clo))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clo), wf(c0, chba, chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbo), wf(c0, chba, chba))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(c0, clo))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clo), wf(c0, chba, chba))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cbo), wf(c0, chba, chba))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clo), wf(c0, chba, chba))

comment: A bounded linear Hilbert space operator is a Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
